##Random talk (short record of epidemic period)

Micro-signal Mengbeiyu

Feature Introduction, an anachronistic cynic's thought and attempt.

On Harvard: a brief history of Harvard

A meeting was held today, and it was requested that all the returning people from every outdoor area in the village be checked? What kind of transportation do you use? Train number? How's your health so far? Who Have you been in contact with since your return? Of course, especially those who have been to Wuhan, Hubei Province.

My brother texted me and said, "you're on the front lines of the epidemic now. "

"Not really, " I replied. "Doctors and nurses are the heroes on the front lines of the epidemic. We're only on the second line, or even the third. "

A few employees balked at the leadership's decision, arguing that calling everyone back would be counterproductive and that an emergency meeting of 200 people in the morning was a security risk. The only relief is that director tax Baihe has brought masks, but the number is much less than the original plan, to the participants each one, will not be issued again.

For example, Haiyan is not satisfied with this, since we need to work, why not give enough protective gear?

AKIKA smiled wryly. Village officials, production leaders, and community grid workers were going to canvass the houses. They were meeting hundreds of people face to face every day. They were all asking me for masks. But we didn't even have masks, so I had to tell them, we're working on it. If there's enough masks, we'll give them to everyone.

I said, "close. ". I read the authoritative state media data, now many mask manufacturers emergency resumption of production, a day can produce 8 million masks, if the country's mask production plants at full capacity, a day can only produce 20 million pieces. The population of Wuhan is 11 million, because in the worst-hit areas, let's say these 11 million people basically wear masks every day, if they use one mask a day, plus the cities around Wuhan, even if the country's manufacturers are at full capacity, there will probably only be enough to supply Wuhan and its surrounding hard-hit areas, and the shortage of masks will continue for quite some time.

Now that we've called all two hundred of our staff and cadres back, I think we should all go home so as not to increase the chances of infection.

I said, it's hard to lead. You can never shut someone up. If we go on vacation, the keyboardist will say that the country is in crisis, doctors and nurses and people from all walks of life are fighting the epidemic, and people from the government are on vacation? If we gather everyone together, in case there is an epidemic, it will be said under the keyboard that the leaders put the lives of Party members and cadres at risk for political achievements. In fact, when we come back to work now, in addition to really having to do some work, it's all about making a gesture to let people know that even when we don't have a specific job, we're on call at the office.

Akika said. Do you think school will start? We haven't been notified. If we were GONNA postpone school, we would have.

I said it was a done deal that schools would have to start late, that shopping malls would have to be closed, but supermarkets and wet markets would have to be closed, or shortages would cause panic. Today, when I went to the supermarket, I saw many people rushing to buy rice, noodles, spices and instant noodles. Ziwu County can no longer buy any masks. My friend drove to the provincial capital to look for a mask bought by his friends, it's 20 bucks a pop.

Cui asked me, "Beiyu, didn't I hear you have a lot of masks? "? Make some for me, too!

Indeed, as if I had known in advance, after the outbreak began, I looked around the house and saw dozens of 3m masks and piles of instant noodles. The mask was bought two years ago when the smog in Sanjiang City was at its worst. As a result, the air in Sanjiang City improved in a few months. Moderate pollution is relatively rare, not to mention heavy pollution. So after using some masks, there's still half a box in there. A few dozen boxes of instant noodles would explain it better. Isn't that standard for a single guy who can't cook?

But you know what's more important to a single man than life? It was the opposite sex, really, and I was going back to my home town in backcountry, thinking that it was a sparsely populated area, and that the virus would hardly ever get there, and that we could just stay home? So before I went home, I gave the remaining 3m masks to my two beauties, Gu Ling and Sun Le. I didn't keep any.

So, the man is like this, for the female sex, is the life all don't want, ha ha..

Recently I talked about a teacher, let's call her teacher Ruan! The head teacher of the high school, petite and good looking, came to my home for a meal, along with Huahua and Dafa. In order to show my independent housekeeping, I didn't have the self-knowledge to fry a bowl of egg fried rice that I had just learned. Maddy finished eating it and asked for a second bowl; Huahua ate most of the bowl; teacher Ruan didn't finish half the bowl, i finished a bowl myself, but I didn't have the courage to eat a second one; the talent show was a failure.

But I still brazenly asked teacher Ruan, this time how the Egg Fried Rice taste? Give me a score! Ruan paused and said, 70 points.

Later, Ruan and I have been sending wechat messages. Although not every day, the content of the chat is not very rich, but from the feeling of the dialogue, I feel pretty good. I think she is very compliant with me, although I did not tell her what to do, but I could feel that she was deliberately cooperating with me to avoid opposing my opinion, which I thought was a good sign.

Of course, there was also a problem. That is, there was a new young civil servant in our unit who was also a beautiful woman. One day when we were chatting, she suddenly and quite frankly told me how she felt about me. This was not a confession either, because all she said was that she thought I was a nice guy, and we could try to get to know each other.

To be honest, it caught me off guard. I would have been very happy if I hadn't met Ms. Ruan, but now that I've met Ms. Ruan, I don't know what to do.

My sister in law asked me, who do you like better?

I said, I don't know, but I want to know who likes me more. Because I have a lot of experience of failure, I am afraid I choose a, avoid B, as a result, a dumped me, I can not go back to find B; if I choose B, rejected a, in case B dumped me later, then I can't go looking for an a anymore. I wanted to touch them both, but I didn't think it was morally tenable.

My brother said, this question is really difficult, but you must consider clearly, the county town is so big, you can not and two girls at the same time contact, otherwise it will be awkward to meet.

But now I have thought clearly, daughter easy, Happy Are Those in Love, I think teacher Ruan to me should be more emotional, I at this time without reason cut off contact, it should hurt her feelings; And the young civil servant to my feelings should not be so deep, or no feelings at all, I think if I tell her clearly, should not hurt her.

So at present I will devote myself to this feeling with teacher Ruan, and expect a good result!
